properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 2:00PM PST until January 6 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
8 to 13 feet at 14 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Pigeon Point to Point Pinos 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 9 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 9 PM PST MONDAY
